sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"武器，兵器"之意。
means: arms ：指士兵使用的具体的武器，如枪、炮等。
wepon ：普通用词，含义广泛，从随手可得的棍棒石头到各种枪炮，甚至原子弹等都可称为weapon，还可作引申用。
armament ：多用复数形式，指军队的武器装备。书面用词。

sentence.Network_en: The fears have prompted several countries to embark on massive armament plans.
sentence.Network_cn: 几个国家开始实施大规模的军备计划，以防患于未然。

sentence.Network_en: The unit has insufficient armament with which to do battle.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个分队缺少作战的武器装备.

sentence.Network_en: The high tax policy is certainly unpopular, although it's unlikely to meet the soaring armament expenditures.
sentence.Network_cn: 高赋税政策肯定是不受欢迎的, 但也未必能满足飞涨的军备开支.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 八月十二日苦苣（MarshSowThistle）：武装（armament）（Armament）八月十三日泽菊（FenRagwort）：隐居（SecludedLife） 八月十四日百日 …
军字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 军乐〖 martial(ormilitary)music〗 军备〖 armament〗 军操〖 militarydrill〗.
学词根记单词_英语杂谈_天涯论坛 ... arms n. 武器, 兵种 armament n. 军备, 武器 armistice n. 停战, 休战.
新概念英语第四册词汇手册_百度文库 ... arise vi. 出现 armament n. 武器装备 arouse vt. 唤醒.

list.abs: 军事作战术语构成 - 风中之烛的日志 -... ... armament depot 枪械库 armament division 军械部 armament equipment 军械装备.
英语专业八级复习经验总结_百度文库 ... unconditional surrender 无条件投降 armament race 军备竞赛 mushroom cloud 蘑菇云.
... military industrial enterprise/defense industries军火工业 armament industry军律严明 Military laws are peremptory.
到了冷战时期,the cold war(冷战)、nuclear threats(核威胁)、nuclear armament(核军备)、two superpowers(两个超级大国)等词语频频出现。到了八十年代末,美国出.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (in the sense 'force equipped for war'): from Latin armamentum, from armare 'to arm' (see arm)

entry.tran: （飞机或军用车辆配备的）武器，军械，火力装备
entry.def: Armament is used to refer to weapons and bombs carried by an aircraft or other military vehicle.

example.ex: ...a bomber with twin engines and heavy defensive armament.
example.tran: 配有双引擎和重型防御装备的轰炸机

entry.def: A country's increase in the number and effectiveness of its weapons is its armament .

example.ex: ...the pursuit of national security through national armament...
example.tran: 通过全国性战备保障国家安全

example.ex: The fears have prompted several countries to embark on massive armament plans.
example.tran: 几个国家开始实施大规模的军备计划,以防患于未然。

means.word_mean: 1. weaponry used by military or naval force
2. the act of equiping with weapons in preparation for war

auth_sentence.content: India is in the midst of a very ambitious re-armament program.
auth_sentence.res_content: India is in the midst of a very ambitious re-armament program.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: India is in the midst of a very ambitious re-armament program.

auth_sentence.content: Going in to attack, the Exeter drew the fire of the Graf Spee's main armament.
auth_sentence.res_content: Going in to attack, the Exeter drew the fire of the Graf Spee's main armament.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Going in to attack, the Exeter drew the fire of the Graf Spee's main armament.

auth_sentence.content: In this age of scientific armament, every new invention that bears at all upon the art of warfare is carefully weighed in.
auth_sentence.res_content: In this age of scientific armament, every new invention that bears at all upon the art of warfare is carefully weighed in.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In this age of scientific armament, every new invention that bears at all upon the art of warfare is carefully weighed in.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使人惊动的, 令人担忧的
stems_affixes.word_buile: alarm惊慌,警告+ing令人……的→adj.使人惊动的, 令人担忧的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有扶手的, 武装的, [动物]有防卫器官的

stems_affixes.word_buile: al加强+arm武器,臂→加强武器→警告

stems_affixes.value_cn: 臂, 臂状物, 衣袖, 海湾, 武器

stems_affixes.word_buile: arm武器,臂+ada=ade集体,表示群体→n.舰队;大批
arma=arm武器,臂+ment物→武器,兵器总称

stems_affixes.value_cn: 陆军, 军队, 大群, 大军
stems_affixes.word_buile: arm武器,臂+y表名词→n.陆军, 军队, 大群, 大军
al加强+arm武器,臂→加强武器→警告

stems_affixes.value_cn: 供给, 提供, 武装, 装备

sentences.en: The unit has insufficient armament with which to do battle.
sentences.cn: 这个分队缺少作战的武器装备。

sentences.en: A small number of nations provide the world with armaments.
sentences.cn: 少数几个国家向世界各国提供军火。
